coredata.dc:title: An Exploratory Study on the Curricula Constructions of Sports Major Free Normal Students in China
coredata.prism:issueName: International Conference on Future Computer Supported Education, August 22- 23, 2012,Fraser Place Central - Seoul
coredata.dc:creator: Feng, Ran-ran
Peng, Zhao-fang
Fan, Aa-hui
coredata.dc:description: AbstractWith employment of utilizing the investigation, expert interviews and comparison, this article investigates the curricula construction, curricula design and curricula content for sports free normal students. On the basis of the investigation, this article analyzed the theoretical framework of curricular construction and proposed some suggestions. We hope that it can provide some evidences for curricula design for sports free normal students.
coredata.dcterms:subject: Sports major
Free normal students
Courses
Practice

head.ce:title: An Exploratory Study on the Curricula Constructions of Sports Major Free Normal Students in China

ce:affiliation.ce:label: a
ce:affiliation.ce:textfn: Inst of foreign, Southwest University, Chongqing 400715, China

ce:affiliation.ce:label: b
ce:affiliation.ce:textfn: Inst. of PE, Southwest University, Chongqing 400715, China

ce:abstract-sec.ce:simple-para: With employment of utilizing the investigation, expert interviews and comparison, this article investigates the curricula construction, curricula design and curricula content for sports free normal students. On the basis of the investigation, this article analyzed the theoretical framework of curricular construction and proposed some suggestions. We hope that it can provide some evidences for curricula design for sports free normal students.

ce:other-ref.ce:textref: Liang Yu.Of College Teaching Master of Teaching Method[D]Master's thesis of Huazhong University of Science and Technology, 2008:6.
